en.title: Youth
en.body:
**The daily Bible reading devotion for young people.**   

Take less than 15 minutes a day to cover the whole Bible in 365 days with selected Bible readings and a full commentary from Nicky and Pippa Gumbel. 

Toby Stokes introduces this edition of the Bible in One Year which encourages us not only to grow in our relationship with Jesus but also to apply the Bible practically to our everyday life.
